Computational Intelligence and Games 2014 in Dortmund, Germany
conference dates: August 26 to 29, 2014     http://cig2014.de/

** 6 DAYS TO GO, submission deadline April 1 **

keynotes:
Rilla Khaled, University of Malta
Mark Riedl, Georgia Institute of Technology
Thorsten Quandt, WWU Muenster
Jochen Peketz, Blue Byte GmbH

tutorial:  (call still open until April 1)
A Panorama of Research on CI and AI in Games,
Julian Togelius and Georgios Yannakakis

competitions:
Fighting Game Competition
Human-Like Bots Competition
General Video Game Playing
Starcraft AI Competition

(competition paper deadline will be in 1st half of May)

Guenter Rudolph and Mike Preuss, General Chairs


-- 
Julian Togelius
